SELECT t.id, t.name, t.type, CASE WHEN t.type='menu' then '菜单' ELSE '按钮' END as typeName, t.url, t.parent_id parentId, t.available, s.name parentResourceName, t.permission, CASE WHEN t.available=1 then '有效' ELSE '无效' END as availableName FROM sys_resource t LEFT JOIN sys_resource s ON t.parent_id=s.id
AND t.name like CONCAT("%",#{name},"%")
